channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOGE Chair Joni Ernst takes on food stamps in new bill to hold states 'accountable'
item.description: Sen. Joni Ernst, the chair of the DOGE caucus, is rolling out a new bill that targets excess disbursements in the "food stamp" program.

item.title: Democrats Lose Their Minds Over Trump's Funding Freeze, Then Flat-Out Lie About Its Impact
Thomas Massie and Mike Lee advocate for US to dump NATO
item.description: Rep. Thomas Massie and Sen. Mike Lee promote the policy idea of the U.S. ditching the NATO alliance.

item.title: Trump's First Law Signing to Be Laken Riley Act
item.description: President Donald Trump on Wednesday will sign the Laken Riley Act into law as his administration's first piece of legislation.
